snippet.title: Pelagicland
snippet.description:
Pelagicland is a nautical-themed idle MMORPG.

You can collect resources from the adventure, earn coins by trading items, recruit crew members to build up your team. As a ship owner, you need to send your team to different adventure map, as long as searching resources automatically. Using the collected resources to upgrade your ship. In-App-Purchase will not make you grow fast, so you can enjoy the game without purchase.

🔰Level Up
Use the collected resources to upgrade your ship and unlock adventure map. Increase the storage space to store more resources.  Recruit high level of crew member.

⛴Collecting
Send your team to adventure map, search the chest from adventure map and collect resources.

🤖AFK Task
You can send the team to collect resources automatically even you are offline. You may collect the resources after a period of time.

🏪Trading
Trade the items in the global market. Sell the resources to earn coins and buy the items from other player.

💬Chatroom
Communicate with another player in the world

📜Multi-language supported
